long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NoteNit: Your AI-assisted companion for meaningful web browsing.

Key Features:

ðŸ“Œ Quick Access: Simply click the NoteNit icon or use Ctrl+Shift+L (or Cmd+Shift+L on Mac) to bring up the notepad in an instant.

ðŸ“Œ Save Web Notes: Easily highlight text on any site, right-click, and store it to NoteNit. Never lose an insight again.

ðŸ“Œ Organize Effortlessly: Transform scattered web discoveries into structured notes. Edit, delete, or get AI feedback with just a click.

ðŸ“Œ Dynamic AI Insights: Understand your content better with intelligent feedback. Just activate the "Play" or "Run" icon beside your note.

ðŸ“Œ Personal Prompt Library: Dive deep with your own curated prompts to spark creativity on any website.

ðŸ“Œ Check Site Relevance: With one click, compare the current webpage to your saved notes. Stay aligned with your objectives by understanding the relevance of the content you're exploring.

Experience the Web, Upgraded:

NoteNit isn't merely a browser extension; it's your guide in the vast expanse of the web. With it, every online interaction becomes more purposeful and insightful. Journey through the web with intent, understanding, and clarity. Install NoteNit now and transform your browsing experience!
